name: Rubik's Cube
discri: A 3D combination puzzle consisting of a cube with six faces, each made up of nine smaller squares. The goal is to twist and turn the cube to align all faces with a single color. It promotes problem-solving skills, spatial awareness, and patience. Perfect for a mental challenge and entertainment for individuals or competitions.
maxTime: This exciting kids party will give your child a birthday of memories and fun picnic games for just
